name: Murder That Mansion
description:
This is the first game we've developed at the Huron Video Game Development Club. Although it may not have all the features we initially intended, we're excited to have this completed project up and running. Have patience with glitches, we'll be sure to solve them if you bring them up!

Installation:

Download the ZIP for your respective OS (Win or Mac), run GAME.exe and you should be all set!
